title: Tom.Clancys.Ghost.Recon.Future.Soldier.v1.3.Update-SKIDROW
description:
S  K  I  D  R  O  W
.the leading force.

proudly presents
Tom Clancys Ghost Recon Future Soldier - v1.3 Update (c) Ubisoft

12-07-2012....Release Date <-> Protection.............Ubisoft DRM
FPS..............Game Type <-> Disk(s)........................DOX

RELEASE NOTES

Patch 1.3 Changes

- Input compatibility fix
- Mouse + WASD not working on some configurations;
- Mouse + Xbox 360 Controller (no need to unplug the pad, everything
will work simultaneously): when you connect/disconnect pad on-the-fly
the key icons will change during the next pop up// the game still
will display pad icons if the pad is connected.

INSTALL NOTES

1. Run GRFS_1.3.exe and install
2. Copy everything from the SKIDROW folder into the game installation
3. Start game and you will be presented with the Ubisoft login screen
Username is of course SKIDROW, leave it like that
Type anything as password, just make sure its atleast 6-8 characters
long and put a mark in "remember me"
4. Hit the Play button!
5. Play the game
6. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy!

**NOTE**
Make sure all Game and Ubisoft Launcher processes are blocked on
firewall.

GREETINGS

To all friends of the family and honorable rival groups!

ascii art by the
godlike & terrific duo
malodix + irokos
titan artdivision
